thread.title: Bloomberg: Wells Fargo Said to Be Front-Runner to Buy GE Railcar Unit
thread.title_full: Bloomberg: Wells Fargo Said to Be Front-Runner to Buy GE Railcar Unit

title: Bloomberg: Wells Fargo Said to Be Front-Runner to Buy GE Railcar Unit
text:
Bloomberg: Wells Fargo Said to Be Front-Runner to Buy GE Railcar Unit August 28, 2015, 07:08 AM Related: Ge Capital , General Electric Capital , General Electric Company , Railcar , Wells Fargo 
Bloomberg reported Wells Fargo has emerged as the front-runner to buy GE's railcar-financing unit, people with knowledge of the matter said.According to the Bloomberg report, an agreement to buy the business, with more than $4 billion in assets, could be announced by Labor Day, said the people, who asked not to be identified because the matter is private. A spokesman for GE, based in Fairfield, Connecticut, declined to comment, as did a representative for San Francisco-based Wells Fargo.To read the full Bloomberg news story, click here . Most Popular
